description:
Riki meets the cheerful, easygoing Komari on a visit to the school rooftop, and decides to invite her to join the Little Busters. Meanwhile, one of the cats Rin is taking care of strolls along with a mysterious note tied to its tail...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kimi ga Shiawase ni Naru to, Watashi mo Shiawase
Si tu es heureux, je le suis aussi
君が幸せになると, 私も幸せ
